sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button class="info" @click="goToDescription()">Informativa</button>
    <button class="quiz" @click="goToGame()">Quiz</button>
    <button class="service" @click="goToServices()">Servizi</button>
    <button class="admin" @click="goToAdmin()">Amministrazione</button>
    <router-view></router-view>
</template>
<script>

export default {
  name: 'AppMenu',
  methods: {
      goToGame(){
        this.$router.push('/game')
      },
      goToDescription(){
        this.$router.push('/description')
      },
      goToServices(){
        this.$router.push('/services')
      },
      goToAdmin(){
        this.$router.push('/administration')
      }
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped>
button.info{
    background-color: red
}
button.quiz{
    background-color: green
}
button.service{
    background-color: blue
}
button.admin{
    background-color: blueviolet
}
</style>
